long_description: Featuring a locking system that allows you to secure compatible Blackburn panniers with a single key, the Blackburn Interlock Seat Post Bike Rack offers a great option for bikes without frame mounts. Interlock system secures Blackburn Barrier and Local panniers to rack (lockable panniers sold separately); also compatible with most standard panniers and trunk bags. Blackburn Interlock Seat Post Bike Rack fits seatposts from 22 - 32mm in diameter. Includes mounting loop for lights and reflectors (light/reflector not included).
short_description: Featuring a locking system that allows you to secure compatible Blackburn panniers with a single key, the Blackburn Interlock Seat Post Bike Rack offers a great option for bikes without frame mounts.
